code: import{useState,useEffect}from"react";import axios from"axios";const useAxios=url=>{const[data,setData]=useState([]);const[error,setError]=useState(null);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{console.log('useAxios effect is called');const fetchData=async()=>{try{setLoading(true);const response=await axios.get(url);setData(response.data);}catch(error){setError(error);alert("Falied");}finally{setLoading(false);}};fetchData();},[url]);return{data,error,loading};};export default useAxios;
